entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 p.m. ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -1.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 8:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy

Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 67 %

Dewpoint: -6.4°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 8:18 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:18 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 8:18 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
